channel.title: Animation on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in Animation on Ian Wootten

item.title: Aardman
item.description: In order for me to generate this post I’ve created something quite novel on my blog – a new category which I’ve not had a great deal of experience in previously, “work”. For the last couple of months I’ve been working for Aardman features in Bristol on their forthcoming feature film, “Pirates” – building software, which I’ll be doing at least for the next couple of months too. I’ve been having an amazing experience over this time.
